entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 1:30 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -13
Wind: SW 41 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 1.
